titleStmt.title: Pancharis the first booke. Containing the preparation of the loue betweene Ovven Tudyr, and the Queene, long since intended to her maiden Maiestie: and now dedicated to the inuincible Iames, second and greater Monarch of great Britaine, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, with the islands adiacent.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Hugh, d. 1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: By V. S[immes] for Clement Knight,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; Roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
First and last leaves have woodcut illustrations only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
